sections.comments: Acting for Film and Television. Restricted to students registered in the final year of the BFA Acting Program and/or the BFA Film Production Program. Course DescriptionThis course takes an ensemble of BFA Acting students and Film Production students through the process of creating an original feature film developed through a collaborative process of improvisation, group writing, and location shooting.   The project culminates in a two-night screening of the film at an on-campus venue TBA (Frederic Wood Theatre or The Nest). Course DetailsAs the NAKED CINEMA project is an integrated component of the Department of Theatre and Films production season, its schedule is unlike that of a more conventional course.  However, this allows for some flexibility for students with conflicting schedules in that not all students need to be in class all the time.

description: Advanced film production, including interdisciplinary projects.
